description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address setup error messages in Windows Deployment:

1. Utilize the Microsoft tool SetupDiag to diagnose the setup issue.
2. Follow the guidance available on the official Microsoft Learn page for SetupDiag to further investigate and troubleshoot the error.

**Details**:
- SetupDiag can provide detailed logging and can help pinpoint the cause of the setup failure. This tool is particularly useful when upgrading from Windows 10 to Windows 11, as it assists in identifying configuration issues that may arise during installation. (LLM Synthesized)
